title: Women in Coffee - Women's collective
description: Our Quality Control Lead in Melbourne, Jane Doe, is instrumental in selecting single origin coffee for Coffe House Espresso.

title: Coffee Roasters and Espresso Specialists - Our Story
description: Coffee House is built on relationships. Our success as a coffee roaster is down to the success of the people we choose to partner with – from our first café customer, to our staff around the world.
